subSections.title: Compounds
Etymology
subSections.text:
[[Image:Yellow birch trunk.jpg|thumb|250px|{{lang|ja|幹}} (''miki''): a tree '''[[trunk]]'''.]]
{{ja-kanjitab|みき|yomi=k}} Originally a compound of {{compound|ja|sort=みき|身|tr1=mi|t1=body|木|tr2=ki|t2=tree}}.{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}{{R:Daijirin}}{{R:Daijisen}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|みき}}

# the [[trunk]] or [[core]] of something:
## a tree [[trunk]]
## a plant [[stalk]]
